name: Community Potluck Picnic
description: Join us for a fun-filled potluck picnic where neighbors come together to share food, laughter, and friendship!

name: Charity Run for Hope
description: Lace up for a meaningful run to support a great cause and bring hope to those in need!

name: Summer Music Festival
description: Celebrate the season with live performances, great vibes, and unforgettable musical moments!

name: Neighborhood Cleanup Drive
description: Let’s unite to clean and beautify our neighborhood — small efforts, big impact!

name: Cultural Exchange Night
description: Experience the richness of global cultures in one evening of sharing traditions, food, and stories!

name: Open Mic & Talent Show
description: Take the spotlight or cheer others on at a lively night of music, poetry, and raw talent!
